fields.label: Currency Reference ID
fields.description: This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.

metadata.description: This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.

fields.label: Currency Reference ID Type
fields.description: This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency.
